title: High-order Structure-preserving Methods for Damped Hamiltonian System
abstract:
We present a novel methodology for constructing arbitrarily high-order
structure-preserving methods tailored for damped Hamiltonian systems. This
method combines the idea of exponential integrator and energy-preserving
collocation methods, effectively preserving the energy dissipation ratio
introduced by the damping terms. We demonstrate the conservative properties of
these methods and confirm their order of accuracy through numerical experiments
involving the damped Burger's equation and Korteweg-de-Vries equation.
